text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pct/CodeSystem/PCTCoverageCopayTypeCS defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
pharmacy-deductible Pharmacy-DeductibleThe accumulated amount of patient payment before the coverage begins to pay for medicines.
pharmacy-maxoutofpocket Pharmacy-Maximum Out Of PocketThe maximum amout of payment for medicines which a patient, or family, is expected to incur - typically annually.

name: PCTCoverageCopayTypeCS
title: PCT Coverage Copay Type Code System
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: Defining codes for the classification of insurance coverage copay types for patient

concept.definition: The accumulated amount of patient payment before the coverage begins to pay for medicines.
The maximum amout of payment for medicines which a patient, or family, is expected to incur - typically annually.
